definitions.title: 2. n.pr.loc. a.
definitions.body: [[דְּבִ֫רָה]] c. [[ה]]—[[ָ]] loc., N. border Judah Jos 15:7 (westward Hup Ps 28:2).

definitions.title: b.
definitions.body: [[לִדְבִר]] town of the Gadites Jos 13:26, perh. Lôdebâr 2Sa 9:4 vid. [[לאׁ דְבָר]] Di MV.

definitions.title: c.
definitions.body: [[דְּבִיר]] Ju Jdg 1:11, Jdg 1:11, 1Ch 6:43, [[דְּבִרָה]] Jos 10:38, Jos 10:39, elsewhere [[דְּבִר]] Jos 15:15 +, a royal city of Canaanites anciently called [[קִרְיַת סֵפֶר]] Jos 15:15, Ju Jdg 1:11, [[קִרְיַת סַנׇּה]] Jos 15:49; on the mountains of Judah, in region of Hebron Jos 11:21, Jos 15:49, assigned to the Aaronite priests Jos 21:15 as a city of refuge 1Ch 6:43; mod. Dhoherîye, 5 hours SW. fr. Hebron, acc. to Kn, so Survey:iii. 402; other conject. in Di Jos 10:39 Ri:HWB 265.
